content: Hello everyone, I have just created a pull request for a bugfix regarding the OpenAire implementation. The pull request contains the bugfix as well as 2 tests which approve the fix: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11194
Nice! Just in time for Triage Tuesday! I added it to "ready for triage" and we usually talk about these after standup on Tuesdays. Please see https://github.com/orgs/IQSS/projects/34/views/28
@Florian Fritze I left a review for you: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11194#pullrequestreview-2587188370
@Philip Durbin ☃️ I think I am done with the pull request.
